pull.title: [qa]: enable rpcbind_test
pull.body: Added parsing for `'<host>:<port>'` arguments to `rpc_url()`, as it was required for this test to work. Also, changed username and password that were passed to `get_rpc_proxy()` in `run_allowip_test()` to hardcoded (default) ones via call to `rpc_url()`.

events.message: [qa]: add parsing for '<host>:<port>' argument form to rpc_url()

events.body:
Thank you for fixing the issue!

Concept ACK. Will take a closer look in the coming days...
